    use Pop\Color\Space\Rgb,
        Pop\Image\Gd;

    $image = new Gd('new-image.jpg', 640, 480, new Rgb(255, 0, 0));
    $image->setFillColor(new Rgb(0, 0, 255))
          ->setStrokeColor(new Rgb(255, 255, 255))
          ->setStrokeWidth(3)
          ->drawEllipse(320, 240, 150, 75)
          ->output();

    $image->destroy();
